block.title: STEP 1
block.description: Hello, my name is Nastasia, and I’m  the founder of Template Note. For as  long as I can remember, I’ve been  quite obsessed with anything that has  to do with pens and paper. As time  went on, I grew to become conscious  of the impact I could create by  efficiently utilising paper. I  started growing a collection of  pieces of paper I could write on,  bills, old notes, misprint paper and  more.

block.title: THE CONCEPT
block.description: The idea behind Template Note sparkedup when I met Axel from Chez Rosiprintshop. He had boxes full of excess paper clouding his workspace, and as much as he tried to utilise them for smaller tasks, it was still an issue. One day I asked him if he had ever thought of making notebooks with it anda month later, I found myself printing the first test pages.

block.title: NOTEBOOKS & NOTEPADS
block.description: Today, Template Note has grown andis in constant evolution as we partner with more printing firms. We receive different types of papera nd with each collection, we tryout new printing or binding techniques to obtain the best results.
